descs: [EndSkill] Apply 10% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and 1 other ally with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
- At 4+ highest Reson., apply it to 1 more ally
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.

[EndSkill] Apply 14% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and (1 + (highest Reson. - 2)) allies with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
(max # of other allies that gain [ShieldManagerCryingToad]: 3)
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.

[EndSkill] Apply 20% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and (1 + (highest Reson. - 2)) allies with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
(max # of other allies that gain [ShieldManagerCryingToad]: 3)
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Sinking]
[EndSkill] Gain (15 + 2.5(highest Reson.))% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and gain 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]. (max 25%)
- If this unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'gain 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.
